name: Mother's Day Picnic
description:
It's Mother's Day, and it's time to go out for a nice picnic with your Mother. Please don't fuck with the table settings.

There are fun games for you to play, or you can just enjoy some cheese and crackers.

Happy Mother's Day!

Look: Mouse
Grab: Click
Move: WASD
Reset: R
Quit: Esc

Audio by RHumphries:
https://www.freesound.org/people/RHumphries/
